original: @197b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @197b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: lo ki shva ra sim ha n'a da sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: lo ki shva ra sim ha n'a da sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Lokeshvarasimhanadasatotra-nama

original: bod skad du /üîΩ@198a * // 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / @198a * // 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise called The Lion's Roar of Lokeshvara

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Lokeshvara, the Lion's Roar!

original: gang gis 'jig rten nyes pa ma lus dbang gyur ji srid legs pa'i lam la ma bkod pa //
analyzed: gang gis 'jig rten nyes pa ma lus dbang gyur ji srid legs pa'i lam la ma bkod pa //
translated: As long as the world, completely under the sway of faults, is not established in the path of goodness,

original: de srid de dag yang dag gdon phyir bdag ni byang chub mchog tu bgrod bar byed ma gyur //
analyzed: de srid de dag yang dag gdon phyir bdag ni byang chub mchog tu bgrod bar byed ma gyur //
translated: I will not proceed to the supreme enlightenment in order to truly rescue them.

original: gang gis khams gsum 'di dag seng ge'i sgra chen mchog gis gsal bar gang gyur pas //
analyzed: gang gis khams gsum 'di dag seng ge'i sgra chen mchog gis gsal bar gang gyur pas //
translated: By whom these three realms are filled with the supreme great lion's roar,

original: sdug bsngal can dag bskyab phyir thugs rje'i spyan dang seng ge sgra ldan khyod la bstod //
analyzed: sdug bsngal can dag bskyab phyir thugs rje'i spyan dang seng ge sgra ldan khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, O Lion-voiced One with eyes of compassion, for the sake of protecting the suffering.

original: ral pa rgya che'i dbyibs can dri med zla 'dra shin tu dkar ba'i zhal mnga' ba //
analyzed: ral pa rgya che'i dbyibs can dri med zla 'dra shin tu dkar ba'i zhal mnga' ba //
translated: You who have a face with the shape of vast hair, pure like the moon, and extremely white,

original: bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags brtul zhugs chen po shin tu dag byed dang ldan pa //
analyzed: bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags brtul zhugs chen po shin tu dag byed dang ldan pa //
translated: For many eons, you accumulated the collections, had great perseverance, and were very pure.

original: 'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad lha dang lha min grub pa rnams kyis rab btud pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad lha dang lha min grub pa rnams kyis rab btud pa //
translated: You benefit all beings without exception, and are bowed to by gods, demigods, and siddhas.

original: shin tu rgya che ba yi sku mnga' khyod la rtag tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shin tu rgya che ba yi sku mnga' khyod la rtag tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I always respectfully bow to you, who have a very vast body.

original: padma dmar po rgyas pa zla ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gdan //
analyzed: padma dmar po rgyas pa zla ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gdan //
translated: You sit on a seat of a full-blown red lotus, with the form of the moon.

original: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i rol pas rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i rol pas rnam par mdzes //
translated: You are beautiful on a lion throne, with the play of a king.

original: chos kyi mnga' bdag 'byor pas dri med gsung ni bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: chos kyi mnga' bdag 'byor pas dri med gsung ni bka' stsal pa //
translated: You, the lord of Dharma, with wealth, speak with a stainless voice.

original: 'jig rten mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i dpal gyis dbul mtshan la 'dud //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i dpal gyis dbul mtshan la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the signless glory of the Lord of the World, AmitƒÅbha.

original: g-yas kyi phyag ni padma gsal ba lta bur 'jam pa yis //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag ni padma gsal ba lta bur 'jam pa yis //
translated: With your right hand, which is soft like a clear lotus,

original: khams gsum nyes pa gsum po zhi bar bya phyir rtse gsum pa //
analyzed: khams gsum nyes pa gsum po zhi bar bya phyir rtse gsum pa //
translated: you hold a trident for the sake of pacifying the three faults of the three realms.

original: 'od zer 'bar 'khrigs sprul dang ldan pas rtag tu gang 'dzin pa //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar 'khrigs sprul dang ldan pas rtag tu gang 'dzin pa //
translated: It is always filled with blazing light and emanations.

original: bdag gi thub pa seng ge sgra de la ni rtag tu phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gi thub pa seng ge sgra de la ni rtag tu phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I always bow to that Lion of Sages, my Protector.

original: khams gsum po la thugs rje chen pos gnas kyang skyon gyis ni //
analyzed: khams gsum po la thugs rje chen pos gnas kyang skyon gyis ni //
translated: Though you abide in great compassion for the three realms,üîΩyou do not become tainted by faults.

original: khyod la gos pa med kyang de dag spang phyir khyed kyis ni// g-yon pa'i phyag gis ral gri dam rdzas dang bcas padma bsnams //
analyzed: khyod la gos pa med kyang de dag spang phyir khyed kyis ni// g-yon pa'i phyag gis ral gri dam rdzas dang bcas padma bsnams //
translated: You hold a sword and a lotus in your left hand, along with a ritual object.

original: rgyal ba'i sras po khyod la rtag tu bdag nyid skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras po khyod la rtag tu bdag nyid skyabs su mchi //
translated: I always go for refuge in you, O Victorious Prince.

original: nga rgyal la sogs tshogs kyis g-yengs pa'i sems can rnams la ni //
analyzed: nga rgyal la sogs tshogs kyis g-yengs pa'i sems can rnams la ni //
translated: For sentient beings who are distracted by the host of pride and so forth,

original: dmigs nas rgyal ba lnga po yang dag spros nas de rnams la //
analyzed: dmigs nas rgyal ba lnga po yang dag spros nas de rnams la //
translated: you emanate the five victors,

original: ji lta ji ltar dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis mdzad pa rnams //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis mdzad pa rnams //
translated: and with skillful means you purify them.

original: gang la dgongs pa de mnga' phyag na padma de la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩmkhas pa rnams kyis gang la tshig gi go skabs med pa ni //
analyzed: gang la dgongs pa de mnga' phyag na padma de la phyag 'tshal lo // mkhas pa rnams kyis gang la tshig gi go skabs med pa ni //
translated: I pay homage to you, PadmapƒÅ·πái, who possesses that intention.üîΩThe wise have no opportunity for words

original: thos pa la sogs bral bas khyod la mos dang gus pa med //
analyzed: thos pa la sogs bral bas khyod la mos dang gus pa med //
translated: with regard to you, who are free from hearing and so forth.üîΩI have no devotion or respect for you.

original: de @198b dag rnams kyis mkhas pa'i mchog nyang dag ni thob pa yi //
analyzed: de @198b dag rnams kyis mkhas pa'i mchog nyang dag ni thob pa yi //
translated: By them, the supreme among the wise, Nyang, was attained.

original: mnyam med dpal ldan seng ge sgra la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: mnyam med dpal ldan seng ge sgra la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the incomparable glorious Si·πÉhamukha.üîΩIn another birth, the non-virtue became the form of leprosy, with bones and limbs infested with worms, and speech impaired.

original: skye ba gzhan gyi mi dge mdze yi rnam par gyur pa rus pa dang // sna nas rkang lag srin bus skad 'gags ldan pa dag / khyod bstod pas ni skad cig gis ni gser mdog lta bu'i lus su gyur //
analyzed: skye ba gzhan gyi mi dge mdze yi rnam par gyur pa rus pa dang // sna nas rkang lag srin bus skad 'gags ldan pa dag / khyod bstod pas ni skad cig gis ni gser mdog lta bu'i lus su gyur //
translated: By praising you, in an instant, the body became golden-colored like gold.

original: thub pa seng ge sgra khyod la ni de nyid de la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: thub pa seng ge sgra khyod la ni de nyid de la skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to you, Sage Si·πÉhamukha, right there.

original: klu yi mnga' bdag gyur pa chu lha dbang du mdzad nas ni //
analyzed: klu yi mnga' bdag gyur pa chu lha dbang du mdzad nas ni //
translated: Having taken control of the lord of nƒÅgas, the king of water spirits,üîΩFor the sake of pacifying untimely rain, lack of rain, leprosy, and faults,

original: dus min char dang char med mdze dang skyon dag zhi don dang // 'gro ba'i don dang don med tshogs dag rab tu sel bar mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: dus min char dang char med mdze dang skyon dag zhi don dang // 'gro ba'i don dang don med tshogs dag rab tu sel bar mdzad pa yi //
translated: For the sake of beings, and for completely dispelling meaningless assemblies,

original: brtson 'grus brtan par rab brtsams khyod la kun nas 'dud //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtan par rab brtsams khyod la kun nas 'dud //
translated: I bow to you who have begun steadfast effort.

original: mang du brjod pas ci zhig khyod kyi mtshan dang sku gnag dang // gang zhig la la gus pas 'dzin pa dang ni sems dga' dag / skye bo de ni longs spyod rgya che bdag thob par gyur nas kyang //
analyzed: mang du brjod pas ci zhig khyod kyi mtshan dang sku gnag dang // gang zhig la la gus pas 'dzin pa dang ni sems dga' dag / skye bo de ni longs spyod rgya che bdag thob par gyur nas kyang //
translated: Will obtain vast enjoyments and attain the state of self.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dkar brgal nas mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dkar brgal nas mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: Having crossed the ocean of existence so difficult to cross, they will attain nirvana.

original: ngag gi dbang phyug la sogs gang gis kyang ni rje btsun gyi //üîΩyon tan phyogs gcig cha tsam bskal pa du ma ru //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug la sogs gang gis kyang ni rje btsun gyi // yon tan phyogs gcig cha tsam bskal pa du ma ru //
translated: Even the Lord of Speech and others,üîΩEven with great effort over many eons,

original: 'bad pas kyang ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na //
analyzed: 'bad pas kyang ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na //
translated: Could not express even a fraction of the qualities of the Jetsun.

original: ji ltar bdag 'dras 'khrul kyang gus byas 'di dag bzod par gsol //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag 'dras 'khrul kyang gus byas 'di dag bzod par gsol //
translated: So please forgive me, one like me, who has erred out of respect.

original: 'jig rten gsum po'i sdug bsngal 'phrog byed mchog gi dges byed can //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po'i sdug bsngal 'phrog byed mchog gi dges byed can //
translated: The one who removes the suffering of the three worlds, the supreme delight,

original: dpal ldan seng ge sgra yi bstod pa las thob bsod nams gang //
analyzed: dpal ldan seng ge sgra yi bstod pa las thob bsod nams gang //
translated: The merit obtained from praising the glorious Simhaghosa,

original: dpag med kunda do shal dgod pa dkar po dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: dpag med kunda do shal dgod pa dkar po dang 'dra ba //
translated: Is like the immeasurable white jasmine garland.

original: de yis skye bo byang chub 'gyur med go 'phang myur thob shog / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i bstod pa /
analyzed: de yis skye bo byang chub 'gyur med go 'phang myur thob shog / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i bstod pa /
translated: The praise of Bhagavat Loke≈õvara Si·πÉhanƒÅda,

original: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by the great Indian master Tilaka, is complete.

original: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba mal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba mal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was translated and finalized by the pa·πá·∏çita himself and the translator Mal.
